title: Update to fix bug
content:
There is a bug on v2.48.0 that prevents new tile creation on new empty tilemap layer.

Update to the latest version to fix that bug now.

title: -- JUNE SALE --
content:

(This event lasts until the end of June)

title: -- JULY SALE --
content:
